title: Natsume Yuujinchou Movie: Utsusemi ni Musubu
synopsis: Takashi Natsume and his spirit companion Madara, nicknamed "Nyanko," continue returning the names of spirits from the Book of Friends given by his late grandmother Reiko Natsume.
